import * as React from 'react'; import _ from 'lodash'; import Table from '@mui/joy/Table'; import Sheet from '@mui/joy/Sheet' export default function Balance(props) { const body = _.map(props.data, (balance, name) => { return ( {name} {balance < 0 ? `-€${-balance}` : `€${balance}`} ) }) return ( {body}
Name Balance
) }
